thread.title: Badlands National Park Posted About Climate Change, Tweets Subsequently Taken Down
thread.title_full: Badlands National Park Posted About Climate Change, Tweets Subsequently Taken Down

author: Josh Feldman
title: Badlands National Park Posted About Climate Change, Tweets Subsequently Taken Down
text:
Badlands National Park Posted About Climate Change, Tweets Subsequently Taken Down by Josh Feldman | 6:28   
The Badlands National Park’s official Twitter account sent out a few tweets this afternoon about climate change that have since been taken down. 
With reports of multiple gag orders being issued by the Trump administration aimed at federal agencies, these tweets were particularly notable: 
The tweets have since been taken down. 
The DNC offered this reaction: Wow – the DNC nat'l press secretary's full statement on the deleted Badlands tweets about climate change: 
"Vladimir Putin would be proud." 
— Michael Del Moro (@MikeDelMoro) January 24, 2017 
A few days ago the National Parks Service retweeted a comparison of President Trump ‘s inauguration to President Obama ‘s. The administration took swift action and NPS later apologized . 
[ images via screengrab/ CBS News ] 
—— 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
